text: How do I set up those github bages to indicate test coverage for my module? All the resources point to Travis, but that ship has obviously sailed.

elements.text: How do I set up those github bages to indicate test coverage for my module? All the resources point to Travis, but that ship has obviously sailed.

text:
<https://docs.github.com/en/free-pro-team@latest/actions/managing-workflow-runs/adding-a-workflow-status-badge>
It's just adding
```<https://github.com/><OWNER>/<REPOSITORY>/workflows/<WORKFLOW_NAME>/badge.svg```
to the readme page isn't it?

elements.text: to the readme page isn't it?

text: Thansk, but I'm more wondering about how to do that automatically. I'm basically asking what are the alternative for displaying my package health using something other than Travis (since I've heard that we can't use Travis anymore).

elements.text: Thansk, but I'm more wondering about how to do that automatically. I'm basically asking what are the alternative for displaying my package health using something other than Travis (since I've heard that we can't use Travis anymore).

text: So, you want help setting up integration testing at all?
